title: Calories in 4 Strawberries
meta_description: Discover calories in 4 strawberries, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations. Get label-style nutrition facts.
assumptions: Medium-sized fresh strawberries (~12 g each), whole, unwashed, no added toppings or sweeteners.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Organic vs. conventional may differ slightly; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: Four medium strawberries provide ~16 kcal, 0.8 g fiber, and natural sweetness from ~2.4 g sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Dipped in 1 tbsp whipped cream per strawberry

faqs.q: How many calories in one strawberry?
faqs.a: About 4 kcal for one medium strawberry.
Yes, 4 strawberries have ~3.6 g carbs, mostly from natural sugars and fiber.

faqs.q: Do strawberries have any fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Negligible fat (0 g) and no cholesterol in fresh strawberries.
Approximately 0.8 g dietary fiber, aiding digestion.
Yesâ€”small ones ~3 kcal each, large ~6 kcal; adjust based on actual weight.
